summary:
This is a simple modification for Lydia but it really makes a difference in her appearance. Now Lydia looks cuter and a bit younger.
Worth looking!!
descriptionHtml:
[b]DESCRIPTION:[/b]

I never really liked the appearance of Lydia, especially her big lips and nose. So i decided to change her appearance for a more beatiful look without being so agressive.
Well, theres not much to talk, take a look at the images and see if it fits to your tastes. :D

[u][b]CHANGES:[/b][/u]

[b]Version 1.0:[/b]

-changed the lip style and color for a cuter look
-changed the hair style and color
-changed the eye color from green to iceblue
-reduced and adjusted the nose to fit the appearance
-minor changes to jaw, cheeks and chin for a cuter/younger look
-brought underbite a bit backward to fit the overall look
-changed the stance to female so that she doesnt walk like a man anymore

[b]Version 1.1:[/b]

-changed her nose for a better one
-changed his voice for a younger feel
-removed all the blush in her face
-removed the tint in her eyes

If you want the same textures as in the pics, please download the version \"No makeups just improved textures\" of the mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812]Better Females[/url]

[b]INSTALLATION:[/b]

Put the file \"HousecarlWhiterun.esp\" and the 2 folders (meshes, textures) inside the Data folder where the game is installed.

For an easier installation use the Nexus Mod Manager (NMM).

Execute the Skyrim Launcher and check in Data Files to see if the mod is selected, if not, check the box.

[b]OBSERVATIONS:[/b]

[u][b]No third-party mods used. Everything i did was to change her appearance based on stuff already present in the game so, no imcompatibility or performance impact using this mod.[/b][/u]

IF U FIND ANY BUGS OR HAVE SUGGESTIONS FOR A NEW VERSION LET ME KNOW!!

[b]DONT FORGET TO ENDORSE IF U LIKE IT!![/b] :D
author: rgabriel15

files.name: Cute Lydia
